name: AteloPhobia:The Story Begins
description: AteloPhobia is a game with elements of Point&Click, RPG and horror. Something is hiding in the basement of the house... And it's definitely not rats.As you descend, you begin your terrifying and deadly adventure.

name: Foreclosure Simulator
description: Manage a bailiff in Foreclosure Simulator. Do business, earn money, buy new houses and vehicles. Decorate your home and garden according to your imagination. Enjoy the open world.

name: Bhop Craze
description: Break the record! Beat your friends! Be the fastest of all! Compete with other players for the title of the best player. Run and jump through beautiful levels and discover dozens of mechanics that will give you unbelievable fun in the game!

name: Mawthorne
description: Explore the ancient underground of this strange, alien world in this metroidvania platformer! Navigate your way through 9 different areas of the underground and encounter powerful bosses that make you stronger, open paths, or alter other areas of the world!

name: The Spirit in the Woods
description: Your journey begins now, Kuara Bay has become one of the few habitable places on earth, but there is still hope for a fresh start. The future is in your hands, with some tools to start and wonderful people by your side, starting this new adventure in a forgotten corner of Brazil.

name: Inside the Backrooms
description: You fell Inside the Backrooms and your only objective is to find an exit. But it won't be easy, there are a lot of puzzles to solve and strange entities to survive...

name: Lootun
description: Create and manage a team of adventurers by sending them to clear dungeons while you handle the loot! Hunt for powerful items and then upgrade them to defeat challenging encounters!

name: Slitherlink
description:
A mobile version of the pen and paper puzzle game from Nikoli.

The goal is to draw a closed loop around the edges of the grid such that every cell has exactly as many edges touching it as its number indicates.

name: Delta Manifold
description: Explore a strange interconnected world, find weapons to shoot those that stand in your way, and discover hidden upgrades and abilities to discover even greater secrets in an action adventure first person metroidvania.

name: Expansion Core
description: Expansion Core is a Nomadic Survival game that borrows both first person and real time strategy elements. Gather resources, craft tools and build allies to help you survive. Inventory management is key as you move throughout the landscape.

name: Iron Jaw
description: Choose one out of five avaliable mechas, pick your weapons and enter in Bulian to wipe out all the bugs you find in your path. How long can you survive?

name: AstraX
description: AstraX is a side-scrolling action game about flying ships that can destroy everything in their path.

name: Bum Simulator VR
description: Bum Simulator VR is a sandbox game bursting with humor and memorable characters. You live on the streets of Bumsville. Do you have what it takes to adapt, survive and become an urban legend?

name: Caterpillar
description: In the world of shadows, guide the caterpillar through forests and fields, dungeons and mountains, where enemies and obstacles await you. Eat flowers, defeat enemies, and clear your path to keep going.

name: Nuts Space Shooter
description: Repel extraterrestrial entities!

name: Dreaming Worlds
description: Dive into the dreaming worlds of the four dream keepers and find out why they don't answer anymore. Rescue the trapped inhabitants of the dream worlds, change the dreams back to good and discover mysterious places and puzzles. But something dark will stand in your way.

name: War in Europe: 1940
description: War in Europe: 1940 is inspired by classic FPS and historical operations happened during 1940 in Europe where you will fight along two campaigns(Axis and Allies) allowing you to fight in the conflict in both sides.

name: Spider Slingers
description: Play as a web-slinging spider and struggle your way to the top in this unforgiving rage platformer.

name: Faith & Shield: 4044 Tower Defense
description: Faith & Shield: 4044 Tower Defense game, where you protect the human settlement from the incoming invaders, robots and other creatures, never seen before on our planet.

name: Astortion
description: Astortion is a minimalistic, atmospheric puzzle-platformer that revolves around gravity. Explore the ruins of the most pivotal research facility on earth, unlock new abilities that mess with spacetime itself, and get to the bottom of what is going on.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack
description: The Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack includes the unique playable character Castellan Garran Crowe, and the Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters Original Soundtrack.

name: She is mad: Pay your demon
description: A horror defence adventure set in the 80's in which black magic to save a daughter has gone wrong

name: Idle Business Tycoon: Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 2
description: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 2. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!

name: Seasons
description: Take a journey through the seasons across 48 unique levels. Seasons is 2d platformer with simple charming visuals, relaxing music and plenty of features for you to find along the way.

name: Para Eyes
description: Para Eyes is a spot the difference point and click horror game. You are tasked with the responsibility of monitoring live security cameras and reporting anomalies. Keep your eyes open, your sanity up, and survive the night!

name: The Warrior's Path
description: The Warrior’s Path is a singleplayer RPG, focused on your decisions in many different events. Those decisions can have longterm effects on other events. Prepare your character for hard fights with different crafting skills. How long can you walk on the warriors path? What's your story?

name: Lightout 2
description: Lightout 2 is a psychological horror game with a scary atmosphere, the game takes place in an Abandoned hospital.

name: Paperman: Adventure Delivered
description: Explore colorful worlds, uncover secrets, and collect all golden letters in this 3D collectathon platformer. Go on an adventure with Paperman and the team, find the lost mail and defeat the greedy dragon!

name: Payloaders Strike!
description: A fast-paced first person action game, with heavy emphasis on short range combat and gun combos. Free your coworkers and take down Concrete's reign!

name: Genius vs. Antichrist 1
description: An amazing adventure game . Sometimes as a RPG

name: Legend of a Soul Hunter
description: Legend of a Soul Hunter is an action-adventure game with RPG elements. Explore islands and many individual dungeons by ship. Get items with different abilities, defeat monsters and become a successful soul hunter!

name: Stripped of Title: Backlash - Episode 1
description: Stripped of Title is an adult quest that follows the story of Bernadette. Forced to pay her Father's debt, she was reduced to poverty. Hunger, irregular work, demanding clients - her life is a nightmare. One day she learns about an ancient treasure, and the following events change her life forever.

name: Ninja Sneaking R
description: Idiot girl who invaded the enemy's castle. Kunoichi. Quickly conquer all 100 stages without being spotted by the enemy.

name: Skotos: Levels Pack
description: With the levels pack for Skotos, you can unlock 9 new levels, new variants of the puppetmaster clown, and new platforms to traverse across.

name: The Backrooms: Deeper
description: A first person immersive experience into The Backrooms. Experience them as a scientist working for [REDACTED] . Solve puzzles to advance the many halls of surreal terror. Take photographs for your team to see if The Backrooms are a reality, or just your sanity dripping away.

name: Tales of Agaris
description: This game is a prequel to Heroes of Time, set 1000 years before the events of said game. The events here would approximate the "Middle Ages" of the universe of the Trilogy of Time. It can be interesting if you play this game before playing Heroes of Time to emerge on the trilogy.

name: Davy's Debris
description: Davy’s Debris is a fast-paced action beat ‘em up where you pick up trash. Launch your long arms to grab your enemies and fling them across the screen on your mission to clean all the trash off the beach.

name: Fabled Kingdom
description: Explore the crumbling ruins of a ancient kingdom. Uncover it's mysterious and powerful artifacts and combine their effects to destroy the dangerous defenses that hide within The Fabled Kingdom.

name: The Backworld
description: Experience a non-linear turn-based horror RPG. Navigate through eerie corridors and surreal dimensions, while battling and evading terrifying monsters. Grow stronger by exploring every corner, not grinding battles. Forge your own path to find new colorful worlds, and decide the fate of the universe.

name: Model Builder: Expansion Pack no.1
description: Model Builder: Expansion Pack no.1 contains four new models: a tank, plane, fantasy figurine, and a boat! Every new model is linked to a new quest and new Steam Achievement! Get them all!

name: Nectar
description: Nectar is a yuri fantasy visual novel about a butterfly girl.

name: Monkey Adventure
description: Run, jump, attack, explore. Cross the various dangers and reach the destination.

name: Ro-Bounce
description: Take up the adventure and face down the uncompromising vertical platforming of RO-BOUNCE. Push upwards in quest of an anti-virus to save your village from the dreaded Malhax. Move forward with caution; one missed jump could lead to a long fall back down...

name: Eye For Eye
description: Fast Paced Visceral Action. First-Person arena combat.

name: inAntrum
description: inAntrum is an atmospheric 3D Action-Adventure-RPG developed as game series and released in five parts. It combines Action-RPG elements as well as Adventure-Puzzle elements and a stylized 3D graphic in an entirely new fantasy setting.

name: The World of Gangs
description: The King’s Mountain Gang disciple, Lu Huanding, set out with her childhood friend Yuan Liai and the others, To find the legendary lost Excalibur. The ventured in the world of gangs, encountered many incidents of that world on the way, experienced all kinds of dangers, and solved various problems.

name: WestFallen
description: Story-driven open world RPG that throws you into a grand adventure in the world of WestFallen. Explore, quest, and fight your way through the world as you seek to avenge your family. Explore and experience the world of WestFallen as you follow the story or go your own way.

name: Nedia Hotel
description: Experience the thrill of not being able to do anything but run from the horrors within the Nedia Hotel. A First person, PSX stylised Horror game that takes you to Nedia hotel to finish a simple task of carrying 8 plates! Though, is it really that simple?

name: Where the Stars Brought Us
description: “Where The Stars Brought Us” is a visual novel game about a boy, Ryo Yung, who is from Seoul, South Korea. He and his family (mother, father, and sister) take what was meant to be a week-long trip to Tokyo, Japan. This begins Ryo’s many adventures.

name: Joshua's Legs
description: Joshua's Legs is a strange game about an arachnid hoping to find his long lost prosthetic legs collection. Control the spider's legs individually using your joysticks. Venture in a world that will only reveal its secrets to the true hardened climbers.

name: Thirayan
description: Thirayan is an action platformer game set in India. A hand-drawn action platformer game offering players new experience with its story and art.

name: Forsaken Champions
description: Forsaken Champions is a one-of-a-kind blend of ARPG and CRPG. Freedom is yours, build, adapt and complete your campaigns then play them to your liking ! Embark in your heroic adventures to live with your friends, however beware of the mood of the adventure master !

name: Block Fight
description: It's a tower defense game that uses blocks to build fortresses against monsters. Gathering resources, building defenses, and keeping an eye out for the abilities of a variety of monsters.All of these will challenge the player's strategic choices, resource management, and immediate reactions.

name: Otter Chaos
description: Otter chaos is a 3D cute, cooperative puzzle solving game where you play as otters who scramble to chase their mischievous babies back home before the zookeeper notices!

name: One Shot
description: One Shot is a Ultra Dynamic shooter when you try to survive against a waves of enemy and fight a "final boss" at the end of each waves.

name: Legends from Lacoytas: The First Seeker
description: The First Seeker is a challenging top down shooter where you will shoot and slash your way through enemies.

name: Lorethem
description: This is an "old school" adventure that will challenge your skills and patience. It's up to you to help a wizard apprentice save his teacher from an evil threat, and along the way, you'll learn new spells, solve puzzles, and defeat enemies.

name: Cyrah's Ascent
description: Cyrah's Ascent is a third-person combat game with high mobility. Imbued with essence, Cyrah must defeat the Laust and avenge her people.

name: Galaxy Life
description:
The universe is full of Starlings, tiny orange aliens that want to take over the galaxy. Create your own space colony, fight epic battles and discover new planets. Train your soldiers, develop your technology and create unimaginable gadgets. Enjoy with your friends in this huge social game.

Original title was delisted and shut down in 2016. This title's new owner, Phoenix Network, recreated and relaunched the title in 2022.

name: Egg Over It: Fall Flat From the Top
description: Take on a real tactical jumping adventure with Egg Over It!!! A challenge where you'll have to lift the egg to the top in search of its source, but explore carefully; a single failed jump could lead to a long fall.

name: Arruyo
description: Arruyo is a 3D first person terror game, where the player is inside a farmhouse with different monsters that will try to kill him/her. To survive and discover the mystery of that place, the player will have to hide from these monsters while investigating the farmhouse.

name: Bleach
description: The Fantasy Girls RPG Gacha Game

name: Pestilent Hunters
description: Welcome to europe, home to one of the most cruel and deadly diseases to ever plague humanity, the plague, the black plague. Join the Pestilent Hunters and you'll have to face a variety of disgusting monsters to try to prevent the end of humanity in this frantic roguelike!

name: Futanari Sex: BDSM Room
description: An explicit erotic visual novel about a couple formed by a woman and a futanari. The two thought of using the services of a dominatrix in order to explore their fantasies.

name: Resbs
description: Resbs is a first-person space survival simulation where you and your friends cooperate to survive in zero gravity on a space station!

name: Outnumbered
description: Outnumbered is a mass-enemy top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements. You may be greatly outnumbered, but not outpowered. Evolve into the ultimate weapon of destruction!

name: Endless Thief: a Furry Stealth Adventure
description: You're a master thief in this ambient furry stealth game. You sneak past any guard, pick any lock, break into and steal from any secured building. Guards see, hear, speak and chase. Observe and prepare the best plan. Ghost unseen in shadows, distract, stalk, trap or knock out and hide guards.

name: Space Spider
description: In the boundless universe, wage an inspiring battle with alien civilizations to defend your last home. Face stronger enemies and get stronger supplies and incentives.

name: Rolando the Majestic
description: Become Rolando the Majestic and find out how he became the most powerful wizard to ever live! Explore parallel levels using magic and time-travel in a stealth based narrative adventure in order to take vengance against the men who took everything from him as a child.

name: Bocce Time! VR
description: It's time to head to the park for some VR bocce action! Bocce Time's various courts will have you throwing, bowling and spinning to win in online matches of up to 4 friends or single player against AI. Closest to the pallino wins, folks! It's Bocce Time!

name: Pumpkin Story
description: Within the country of Sunderlin there is a Cute Spooky Story, nikkis pumpkin story with your best pal asuka to guide you a game of wonder and excitement, you can go through dungeons with puzzles, secrets and a collection of music notes! fighting brooms with bombs, lanterns, fireflies and magic!

name: Run Build Pew!
description: You’re being Bounty-Hunted! Run, Build your ship piece-by-piece and make it work with the parts you find, Destroy outposts and waves of fleets, and Pick your battles carefully to overcome your hunters in this Fast-Paced Top-Down Action Roguelite Shooter.

name: Carnage in Space: Crucible
description: A fast-paced sci-fi action-platormer/beat-em-up with multiple characters and customization for replayability. Features both adjustable difficulty settings and intense post-game challenges for players of all skill levels.

name: Dear Delusion
description: A little girl goes missing, you breaks into the forest restricted area to find her. However, as you explore deeper into the forest, the line between reality and fantasy fades away. Can the you piece together the whole picture, find the little girl and leave the forest?

name: Knights of Fate
description: The Triskelion Knights are an elite force selected and trained to protect the country. They're the King's right hand and they are now called to the biggest mission of their lives, to stop a Shaman from regaining his full powers and starting another war for the souls of the people.

name: Knights of the Exploding Table
description: Knights of the Exploding Table is an explosive platformer that harkens unto the late 90's era of 3D games. Place, kick, lift, and throw bombs to navigate your way to the end of each stage. Collect gems to buy hats and unlock an extra stage. Challenge your friends to exhilarating Explosion Battles!

name: Brave Builder Construct A Climb
description: procedural generated 2d puzzle platformer

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Ragnarök Campaign & Character Pack
description: The nightmare is almost over, but the few surviving members of the Hell Cult have retreated deep into Hell, and have put into motion the mysterious Projekt Ragnarök.

name: Line Path
description: A mind-bending puzzle game about filling all in one line Relax and enjoy

name: Pitchfork Kingdom
description: Pitchfork Kingdom is a 2D hack-and-slash where each level is full of exciting combat, obstacles, and adventure.

name: Slava Ukraini!
description: A completely free game of heroic defence against enemy aggression. Take part in the defence of Ukraine against Russian aggression. A tribute to the courage and valor of the Ukrainian armed forces.

name: Eyes of Darkness
description: Psychological horror, featuring early 90's graphics and music, vast player's freedom and multiple endings! Leonard White, a professional inspector, is looking for his ex-girlfriend, Kimberly Frances, gone missing in Goodsprings, a small town near Nevada holding the darkest secrets...

name: Shadow's Kiss
description: A modern gothic vampire online RPG featuring turn based combat, intrigue, horror, and mature themes.

name: Furry Nights
description: Are you winning son?!

name: Echoes of the Stars
description: Echoes of the Stars is a modern action-JRPG standing on the shoulders of the classics. Follow Rin and Eldric in a tale of two souls, bound together by fate in an epic tale of time, space, love, laughter, and the human condition as they challenge those who seek to destroy existence as we know it.

name: Furry Hentai Isekai
description: Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 furry girls in another world with different personalities and fetishes.

name: Six Braves
description: Strategy RPG game , full of childhood memories!

name: Reborn Souls
description: As a Maiden of the Ecclesia, Sabrina is in charge of special assignments, in lands where dark magic, urban legends and folkore are all real. While investigating a new incident in one of the appeased villages, she will learn much more than she bargained for...

name: Time Thief
description: Time Thief is an action adventure game where leaving your village makes the clock tick. Manage your time to stay alive, stealing seconds from creatures around its overworld with you sword.

name: Battlerace
description: Battlerace is a simple first-person shooter that invites you and your friends to play together! The game combines the most popular and best gameplay modes in one production! In Battlerace you decide how to play!

name: Thunder Ray
description: Thunder Ray is Arcade-Boxing, Retro-like gameplay with blood and violence. Defeat all the best fighters in the galaxy to become the GOAT of the universe.

name: Space Worthy
description: Space Worthy is atompunk science simulator. Use science to save the crew of your wrecked ship. This was supposed be holiday for young scientists on scientific educational pkanet. Now you really have to learn something if you want to get back. Find new parts, learn how to use them, build electronics.

name: The United Space of America
description: The United SPACE of America is a high action, arcade style, run-n-gun bullet hell, twin stick shooter that allows you to absorb enemy bullets with your Proton Sabre while you blast through countless enemies and unlock new abilities. There's air dashing, giant Proton Shots and more!

name: Hexceed: Insulam
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Insulam Puzzle your way through 110 new levels with a new mechanic!

name: Thorn Demon Hunter
description: This is an AVG game similar to Metroidvania. The player will perform a demon hunter exploring and decrypting the castle in the Gothic period and hunting the corrupt soul

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 6
description: A great hidden object game set aboard a cruise ship

name: Portal Dungeon
description: In “Portal Dungeon”, in this multiplayer Roguelike adventure game with random elements, as an adventurer, you and your friends will bravely find the last portal in this portal world, defeat powerful enemies and save the world.

name: Realm of Cubes
description: Realm Of Cubes is a voxel-based action adventure RPG. It takes place in a handcrafted voxel Fantasy world!

name: Alchemia: Creatio Ex Nihilo
description: Alchemia is a turn-based strategy roguelike with a hint of puzzle. You'll collect alchemical reagents, building your own personalized combat satchel, and combine them into magical recipes, unique to each run, to battle against outlandish foes.

name: Story of Eve 2
description: Guide Eve through a succubus training program in the newest "Story of Eve". Experience a new story with improved mechanics and even more outrageous training scenes and outfits!

name: Escape the Unknown
description: Escape the Unknow is ¾ view dungeon crawler rogue-like game that is broken up into chapters. Players will embark on a journey of discovery as they regain their memory through a world of secrets.

name: The Illusion: Nightmare
description: The Illusion: Nightmare Is A Horror Game Made By Professional Crew In The Art Of Horror. You Will Have The Opportunity To Experience One Of The Most Powerful Types Of Psychological Horror Based On An Environment Designed In Every Detail To Be A Real Hell That Makes You Terrified.

name: Dead-End Dungeons
description: Dead-End Dungeons is a randomly generated dungeon crawler featuring turn-based combat. Dungeons are completely random and feature various encounters, treasures, and unlockables.

name: VR Robot Fight
description: Cute catgirl fights with you We designed the opponent to be a cute catgirl, and under the VR perspective, players can experience a cute feeling in the battle.

name: Monsters Loot Swag
description: Top-down, twin-stick, power-up collectathon shooter.

name: Cops 2170: The Power of Law
description:
Cops 2170: The Power of Law is a hybrid of RPG and tactical strategy. The central storyline unfolds in the future where the cyberpunk culture and a highly-urban oriented society have populated North America.

The game is a prequel to Paradise Cracked (2002).

name: Rival Rides
description: Rival rides is an exciting multiplayer VR party game taking place in an out-of-this-world theme park. Compete with your friends online in various mini-games and wild rides, in order to collect the highest amount of golden egg trophies and become the Rival Ride’s champion!

name: Godless grove
description: Godless grove - survival horror with elements of a hunting simulator in an open world filled with horrors. Uncover the terrible secrets of the locals and overcome the disgusting creatures of evil that have gathered over this grove.

name: The Alpinist
description: Make your way up the mountain with your ice axe and your grappling hook. Hold tight, watch your steps and make sure not to fall, you never know how far you're gonna land.

name: Cool Animals
description: Cool Animals is a fun and challenging puzzle game. With it, you'll have to use your various skills to be able to overcome the challenges that exist in each level.

name: Small Worlds
description: A short atmospheric game about exploring.

name: Taisho x Alice: Heads & Tails!
description: Fandisc of the Taishou x Alice series. Contains after-stories for the original characters and includes new routes for sub-characters Ookami and Ryoushi. Also featuring a school-parody story with routes for all the original characters.

name: Infinity Inc.
description: Sci-fi puzzle-platformer game. Find a clone gun, create your own clones and overcome deathly traps by destroying them!

name: Zakuzaku Actors
description: ZakuZaku Actors is a free game created by "Hamusuta". It was first published in 2012, and was released in It was released as an official version in December 2014. Since then, the game has been actively upgraded with additional content.

name: CrashTV
description: Put your TV through a series of trail-and-error experiments in this puzzle platformer.

name: Mythic Legends
description: Mythic Legends is a mobile strategy RPG where you gather armies of mighty champions. Battle it out in the arena to reach the top of the global leaderboard!

name: Charade Maniacs for Nintendo Switch
description: Port of the PS Vita game for Nintendo Switch.

name: Album
description: Album is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as an old woman named Ethel reminiscing about her past in her dreams. The goal is to explore and find effects.

name: Awaits: 10H
description:
Awaits;10H is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It is a prequel to the game Hikensha.
It follows the story of a young boy named Yarishi, who is having a hard time with many familiar problems, but that's about to change, as unknown forces lurk around the house and his dreams watching him constantly. Your goal is to collect effects as well as eight seeds that are scattered throughout the dream world.

name: Bunte Märchenträume
description:
Bunte Märchenträume is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam.

Ilyse is a simple girl stuck in her own house. She can't drive, and she can't leave. So what does she do? She reads and sleeps to pass the time. From there, she explores her colorful dreams in order to escape her bland reality. The goal is to explore and find effects.

name: Closure
description: is a Yume Nikki Fangame for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You explore Markus' dreams and find forms that can change the dreamer's appearance, some forms can let you do things that you could not before.

name: Dream Journey
description: Dream Journey is a Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It stars MC, a nonbinary character with no real name. It's a traditional fangame, based around exploring MC's dream world and collecting effects. As opposed to a bedroom, Dream Journey takes place on a moving train.

name: Fissure
description: Fissure is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Elijah, or "Lie", a boy who refuses to leave his room. A hole in his bedroom wall appears one day, and he decides to explore what's on the other side.

name: Food Diary
description: Food Diary is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as the famous restaurateur Guy Fieri and it plays like a traditional fangame, where you explore the dream world and collect effects.

name: Galactic Merchant
description:
Galactic Merchant is sci-fi business simulator (aka space tycoon game). Starting from small startup with single cargo ship you can grow your company to intergalactic monopoly.

To do so, you could trade, prospect, produce goods, smuggle, rob, give bribes, engage in politics, save lives and use many other options.
During the game you will learn many economical concepts and built-in calculation sheet will help you to use them in practice.

name: Halcyon
description: Halcyon is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You explore the dreams and memories of Fio by sleeping.

name: Jamping Fish
description: All you have to do is control the fish with your keyboard to jump over moving stones, plates, cars and more, and avoid starfish or cats to reach the top of the statue.

name: Mementos
description:
A black mist came without warning, sending all who inhaled it into a deep, unwakeable sleep. The citizens of a village are all trapped in a dream world with only one way to escape: go deeper into the dream and collect all of the mementos. Then, the gate to reality will open. One by one, the villagers went down, deeper into the dream. None have returned. Now, it's your turn. This time, you're determined to collect all of the mementos to free everyone.

Mementos is an entry for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. There are 4 mementos to collect, with a few worlds to explore.

name: Mesonoxian
description: Mesonoxian is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Tyran. Tyran is stuck inside his home due to a rainstorm, leaving him to daydream in his free time. The main goal is to explore and collect effects (known as Influences). A minigame can be played on the console in the room outside the bedroom.

name: Miskatonic Diaries
description: Miskatonic Diaries is a Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It stars Tomato Chain, who refuses to leave her room and instead explores a dream world collecting items.

name: Moon Cradle
description:
A game made for Dream Diary Jam 2017.

Help Alice explore imaginary space worlds. Collect modifications and gather crew for your space ship, Moon cradle.

name: No Outlet
description: No Outlet is a Yume Nikki fangame that was created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Mint, a young lady who uses her bedroom cabinet to wander around in other people's dream worlds collecting "spells" and disturbing private spaces.

name: Onohi
description: Onohi is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Maka as she explores her dream world.

name: Passing By
description: Passing By is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Wren, who embarks on a train to see where it'll take her.

name: Ruler's Reign
description: Ruler's Reign is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. The game uses image collages for its graphics. You play as a woman named Reina as she tries to stop the rainfall in her dreams.

name: Sleepless
description: Sleepless is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Ermes, a sick boy who finds freedom from his time in the hospital through the world of books. This game has some dialogue and light puzzle elements. There are 4 full worlds to explore, several unique npcs, 6 effects, and 3 puzzles.

name: Take the Veil
description:
Take The Veil is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam.
You play as a psychic goat named Ulysses as he arrives at an abandoned campsite. After encountering some strange crosses, he finds an empty caravan to stay in. From here, he enters the Fourth Dimension with the goal of pulling the ethereal crosses. This game contains dialogue and there are a number of NPCs the player can talk to. There are no effects to be gotten.

name: Yume Nyaki
description: Yume Nyaki is a Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. Nyasuki has a dream about being asked by a mysterious person known as Cheru to aid an "Administrator" in some way, and to not harm the tree that Cheru is standing in front of. Then Nyasuki wakes up, and his adventure begins. Nyasuki's main goal is finding effects in the dream world.

name: Revival: Recolonization
description: Set in a post-apoc version of Earth, Revival is a 4x strategy game where the world and its rules can change at key moments, creating a deep and highly replayable experience.

name: Pathogen
description: Pathogen is a real-time strategy game, where you take control of a plague that is causing a pandemic. Your goal is to defeat humanity by improving your abilities and earning points from infections.

name: Seneca 7: A Cyberpunk Odyssey
description: Build a new life in a cozy cyberpunk adventure RPG! Polluted air having you gasping for breath? Drowning in endless debt? Online dating getting you nowhere? Leave your worries behind and reboot your life on Seneca 7, where dreams come true!

name: Banjo-Kazooie
description: The Xbox 360 remaster of Banjo-Kazooie has visual and performance improvements over the Nintendo 64 version. In this version, the player doesn't lose the notes after getting out of a stage, which is a major difference over the original, since it doesn't require the player to get everything again after leaving or dying.

name: Banjo-Tooie
description: The Xbox 360 remaster of Banjo-Tooie has visual and performance improvements over the Nintendo 64 version. In this version, the player doesn't loose the notes after getting out of a stage, which is a major difference over the original, since it doesn't require the player to get everything again after leaving or dying. It also has a reimplementation of the Stop 'n' Swop feature, using the save data from the Banjo-Kazooie remaster to unlock new content.

name: Hungry
description: A short dolphin adventure.

name: A Day in the Life of a Writer
description: A small interactive fiction about the day of a writer, their routine, their work, their fears, and anxieties...

name: A Tale at the Bonfire
description: You're missing in the forest and you have to leave... but it won't that easy. You'll have to survive during the dark night next to a bonfire you find... Will you get it?

name: Adrift in Turbulent Waters
description:
A short tale about bringing hope and help to various people who are all in the same storm.

The game requires you as the player to sail your boat full of supplies to people on islands across the sea from screen-to-screen. Please help with rescuing those that have found themselves at the mercy of the elements.

name: All @ Once
description: ALL @ ONCE is a twine based interactive novel. Take the role of Wyatt Reynolds, your average everyday black teen in the small lake-centered town of Primwood a town where the world is quiet and the mornings are hazed. Where Devils walk the street with pockets full of spice. This young man whose life blinked by without a second thought becomes something more when his mind takes on something new. When the thoughts in his head aren't his own and the reality of reading people's minds comes into play.

name: The Red Village
description: The Red Village (TRV) is the leading Dark-Fantasy franchise in the Metaverse. TRV digital assets called 'Champions' are used across two distinct game modes: Tournaments (currently live, in Beta), and Darklands (currently under development in a multi-year partnership with the award-winning game development studio 'Blowfish Studios' (a subsidiary of global blockchain giant Animoca Brands)).

name: Gränsland
description: The main character of Gränsland is on the threshold of adulthood: she leaves her family nest and moves to an apartment in an ordinary building. But it is not as simple as it seems at first sight, and the atmosphere there is not at all neighborly: the tenants are always hiding something, and the mysterious doors in their apartments, which nobody seems to see, emit a dim light

name: Little Cities
description: Create your own little city and lean in to watch it come to life. See residents move in and populate your island as it grows from a humble village to a bustling metropolis. Design the layout, strategically plot amenities, and make a perfect city where your citizens love to live. Easy to pick up and play but with lots to discover, Little Cities makes your biggest creations possible!

name: Crashocalypse
description:
Crashocalypse is a video game made in RPG Maker 2000 that was released in May 12th, 2018 and was made by one person named "Default" Reese. The game was created as a fangame dedicated to the Let's Player, Mikennemonic and his community, featuring references and in-jokes dedicated to the community in a turn-based RPG format.

The game was released within the MikeNnemonic forums for download, free of charge.

name: Den Yttersta Gåtan
description: Adolescence is a difficult time: parents don't understand and classmates bully. The main character of Den Yttersta Gåtan sits on the window sill and looks sadly out the window with the rain pouring down. Just as she is about to run away, a mysterious messenger from Asgard itself appears, and outside the window a Bivröst appears on which Heimdall is trumpeting Gjallarhorn and announcing the beginning of Ragnarök.

name: Bonfire
description: You’re Scout 817, a member of the not so elite Space Force. You’ve just crashed your spaceship on a strange planet. Your only tools for survival are a fading bonfire, a robot and a limited supply of nourishment cylinders. And what's that sneaking around out there in the dark alien jungle?

name: Rogue Soulstone
description: Collect the Rogue Soulstones in this physics-based, fast-paced action roguelike RPG to achieve ultimate power. Learn spells to create powerful synergies, decimate hordes of corrupted souls, face titanic bosses, die, upgrade and try again with a new build.

name: Arsolid Productions
description: Your dreams and wishes have come true in this immense new world of adventures and stories, in a game like never seen before.

name: Ultrarush
description: Ultrarush is a free-to-play, fast-paced arena shooter where you fight for tokens in the middle of arena. It highly relies on movement, reflexes and gamesense.

name: Astro Bandits
description: "Astro Bandits" is a classic 2D top-view arcade scrolling shooter. Earth has been attacked by aliens and you need to destroy enemy starships and to save the planet. Nice visuals and atmospheric music will immerse you in the Aerospace Forces.

name: A Haunted History
description: A Haunted History is a survival horror game that focuses mainly on the story. Discover everything by exploring the ambiance, finding clues and solving puzzles, and also experiencing some lil' bit... weird situations.

name: Toons City
description: Toons City is a modified version of the classic city simulation. The game introduces gameplay elements to reproduce the sensations and difficulties inherent in creating and managing a real small town.

name: Automaton Kingdom
description: 2D turn-based puzzle game with a medieval setting and two game phases. Allied and enemy characters will behave automatically after setting them up in the edit phase. you can see the outcome of the different iterations of the level in the game phase.

name: Akapulka: The Rainbow
description: Akapulka is a meditative game about floating across unique ancient ruins and collecting flowers.

name: Godspell Defender
description: This unique arcade game will deliver a quick and simple experience designed around making a few perfectly placed shots. Button mashing will do you no good. There are ten distinct spells in the game that must be combined to maximize damage, creating the ultimate god spell.

name: Virtual country: Yuan fairy summon
description: Team game War chess: MMORPG + Catch pet + TCG + MOBA. Fast paced, slow games, Easy to use, difficult to master. Loss mechanism, life mechanism. Open world, free trade. R & D, production , free trad

name: Shooting girl
description: It's a casual stress-busting shooter game where you beat enemies to get gold for upgrades and unlock weapons and the more levels it is, you have to think about how do you complete the game by refine Weapons . Also there alot fun things like turntable flip cards and other mini-games and CG in here.

name: Bewbewbew
description: Bewbewbew is a lovingly crafted, unique, and colorful action-arcade game!

name: Dungeon Delvers
description: Dungeon delvers is a third person action fighting rogue like. Slay hordes of monsters with ever increasingly powerful gear. Hunt for synergies to unlock godly powers and destroy ever increasingly more difficult enemies.

name: Survival Island
description: Survive through somewhat harsh environment! collect & craft item, manage resources. be aware that you have limited space and time.

name: Cryptr
description: A singleplayer hack and slash dungeon crawler game with stat upgrades and numerous levels and enemies to defeat.

name: Rob
description: ROB. We need your help defending Earth from Alien UFO's. Each one having different defenses. Please Rob your are only hope. Play as a Space Control Agent named Rob. Shooting UFO's out of Space to defend Earth.

name: 7th Sign
description: 7th sign is a classic 2D-platformer action game inspired by games likes Doom, Quake, Abuse and Painkiller. Our goal is to entertain the player with massive enemy fights, boss fights and stirring music.

name: Carrot: Pancakes and Waffles
description: a slice of life game where you live a peaceful day in a whimsical hand-painted coastal town

name: A Piano Tale
description: A Piano Tale immerses the player in the life of musician Alexandra Aaronovitch and her father Boris. Can you help Alexandra find the fragments of the secret concerto for piano and orchestra written by Boris, and play it? Travel to the cultural capitals of Vienna and St. Petersburg.

name: Grizelda: Lynx and the Nine Lives
description: Join Lynx on an adventure to rescue a princess and collect 9 souls. A retro-action RPG filled with puzzles, dungeons, and treasure.

name: Yakyosho
description: A simple Japanese horror game, with horrible creatures, not very complex puzzles, and an unwelcoming atmosphere! Have sweet nightmares...

name: A Weekend in Puzzleburg
description: A Weekend in Puzzleburg is a cozy slice-of-life role-playing game. No need to fight monsters or save the world from impending doom - you've merely booked a relaxing weekend getaway in a town known for its puzzles. Welcome to Puzzleburg!

name: Hand of Doom
description: Sign a contract in blood! Travel throughout the planes of existence slaying or befriending powerful doomlords in this wizard simulator inspired by the FMV games and dungeon crawlers of the early 90's. Learn powerful spells to solve puzzles and combat the dark forces amassing against you.

name: Ocean Riders
description: Watercraft racing game with accurate physics simulation in a fantastic setting with overpowered turbojet engines and huge waves.

name: Winter tramp
description: Winter tramp - A story about a tramp who has to overcome many trials, pain and mysteries on his difficult path. The next 40 kilometers are filled with robbers and wild animals.

name: Penitence
description: Return home and uncover the mystery of your daughter's death, and the demon that plagues you, in this escape room style atmospheric puzzler.

name: Warehuman
description: Game theme: JRPGs that talk about violence and mythology Read the story from the point of view of a character from a 'discriminated race' to think deeply about discrimination. In the combat part, the tense BP battle system offers the thrill of 'hunt or be hunted'.

name: TowerFall with Friends
description: A very simple Mario Party inspired mini-game / platformer where you have to watch the color of the flags and quickly run your character to the matching colored platform before the rest get lowered!

name: Extinction Eclipse
description: Defend Humanity against an alien invader who is trying to freeze Earth. Explore space, conquer asteroid fields to mine and extract resources. Build a fleet of spaceships and destroy the enemies in this new space action strategy adventure.

name: Metroland
description: Become a transport tycoon in the 1900s London. Expand transport lines, housing, and businesses to fund your transport empire. Make use of urban planning to create communities that will use your services.

name: White lady
description: "White lady" is a 3D stand-alone role-playing game developed by broken DuanQiaoCanXue studio. This game adopts the full real-time combat mode, and the combat experience is free and refreshing. The game depicts the legend of the White Snake, one of China's four major love myths and legends

name: Kitten Burst
description: Kitten Burst is an Adventure/Racing Game about a Flying Cat set in the year 200X. Explore Sites on the Web, Race through Circuits, & Battle Bullet Hell Bosses to Save Cyberspace.

name: Cabinet of Curiosities VR
description: This is a fully immersive and interactive VR Experience set in a Victorian style Cabinet of Curiosities room, full of hundreds of highly detailed 3D scanned objects from the natural world, that can be picked up, examined, and explored like a museum without restrictions.

name: Animals Transport Simulator
description: Hurry up to take as many orders as possible. Get behind the wheel, but and be careful with the animals.

name: Guacamojo
description: Finally, it's the turtle's turn to rise! Spin, jump, and smash your way through dozens of tricky old-school platforming levels, all with unique gimmicks and mechanics, to challenge even seasoned platform gamers.

name: Reflection
description: Reflection is a VR puzzle game with a traditional Chinese ring to it. Tracing back to the fifth chapter in Dream of the Red Chamber, the game draws inspiration from Jia Baoyu’s visit to The land of Faery, and advances to create a brand-new game using mirrors to solve puzzles.

name: Dismantled Director's Cut
description: Experience the game in its best form with the Director's Cut Edition. New graphics, new enemies, more weapons, more blood...

name: WTP Story 1
description: WTP - Story 1 is a dynamic choice lead adventure.

name: Jewel Match Solitaire X Collector's Edition
description: Explore a fantastical world in this new Solitaire adventure and restore magnificent castles to their former glory! Play more than 1000 (!) levels while unlocking classic solitaire variants! Search every last level for gems that you can use to purchase new upgrades for each scene.

name: Battle Chain
description: A fun multiplayer battle arena, that will incorporate a global leaderboard soon!

name: Speer DX
description: Throw your speer, use it as a platform, and puzzle-platform your way through 125 stages in this director's cut version of the classic Speer!

name: Versus.
description: Versus. is a turn-based multiplayer shooter made in the Unreal Engine 5 aspects. Play in a 1 vs 1 or a 2 vs 2 with or against your friends! Try to survive and be the best at the end!

name: The Kobolds Left Behind
description: A tear-filled story game about the bittersweet last day of three abandoned kobolds.

name: Princess of Seas
description: Princess of Seas is a sea sailing with Open-World, Sandbox, Quest, Explore, Sea Battle. Let's go and save this world.

name: Cute Cats 3
description: Kittens come back to challenge you once again! Test your memory and attentiveness. Play a new chapter of the beloved puzzle game and find all differences in pictures with our cute fellas.

name: Stick Go story
description: Stick Go story is a single-player indie game. It attempts to link strategy board games with fighting RPG games. The stickman-like characters can be regarded as 11 Go pieces, and you can fight against enemies by moving these pieces with some strategy.

name: Coloring Pixels: Mythology 2 Pack
description: This Mythology 2 Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image depicts different Characters and Moments from Ancient Mythology from various cultures! The second book of its kind to let you visit the legends of old!

name: Ethos: Divinity's Curse
description: Journey through the kingdom of Lyrak and its neighboring lands where you'll have to defeat great foes to earn a second chance at life through a mysterious divine entity.

name: Alone in the Grey
description: Alone in the Grey is a first person adventure puzzle game where the player must escape from a UFO they have mysteriously awoke in. Uncover clues and solve puzzles to escape and find out the reason for your capture. Hack terminals and find batteries to obtain freedom.

name: Groovy
description: Groovy is a fast-paced precision platformer where you can manipulate the colors of the world. Use your color powers to avoid traps, walk through walls, and launch through levels.

name: Skylost
description: Skylost is a 3D exploration and crafting game where you climb and glide your way through dangerous floating islands in search of your lost love Amelia.

name: C.A.R.L.
description: C.A.R.L. is a retro puzzle-platformer in which players take on the role of a lost robot in a mysterious factory to uncover the secrets within its walls and thwart the plans of its mastermind proprietor.

name: Two Colours
description: Jump from platform to platform, red to blue, blue to red, timing your jumps precisely, and dodging falls and blocks which kill you over the course of 40 levels, grabbing the 20 collectibles to unlock a secret at the end of the game. Don't lose your focus, don't lose your patience.

name: Kingdoms and Slaves
description: In a kingdom fallen by a disease, nearby kingdoms keep this isolated, meanwhile, people starve, go crazy and die, but there is still a hope of starting again in another place, but for that it will be necessary to leave before the disease takes over your body and soul...

name: The Syber Virus
description: This is a casual rpg game, there are twelve levels from different challenges. You control the main role, with a little bit delicate play skill,to eliminate enemies.You can collect resources inside game to buy items and enhance your role...like a RPG,anyway.

name: Shell Soldier
description: Shell Soldier is an intense first person game that takes place in a dystopian future. Featuring frenetic firefights with a diverse set of enemy combatants ranging from tactics to weaponry, and also a large variety of deadly weapons at your disposal.

name: Owls
description:
In Owls, children match random pairs of owls to clear the screen. After successfully completing each level, they are rewarded with a little fact about owls.
The Parliament School for Owls is very serious about the Buddy System. Every Owl has a buddy, and is not allowed to come in from recess without them. Your job is to help the Owls find their buddy and get in for lunch! Learn about Owls, watch the seasons change and see how quickly you can send the Owls home. Can you earn 3 stars in every level? Every 25 levels the seasons change from Spring to Summer, Fall and Winter. They can earn up to 3 stars per level depending on how quickly they clear the screen, and go back as many times as they wish to retry.

name: Steam Engine
description: “Steam Engine” is an incremental game where you need to build industrial steam-powered machine in a retro futuristic style of technology.

name: Space Kabaam 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bat D
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Collect flies with the main hero of the game The Bat D. Collect all flies in the world!

name: Mighty & Ray in Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: This ROM hack swaps Sonic and Tails for Mighty and Ray, with adapted abilities inspired by their Sonic Mania versions.

name: Supaplex
description: Millions of people around the world have already experienced this joyful adventure! Help Murphy to travel through hundreds of the most diverse game levels! - 111 INCREDIBLY EXCITING LEVELS! Help Murphy beat them all! Collect Infotrons, dodge Zonks, escap…

name: Paradise Island Driver
description: Start your driving adventure on a beautiful island! When you feel warmed up, mix things up and hop into a sports car, quad bike or even a massive bus. This is a racing game that will bring the sun into your life! FEATURES: ▶ 13 UNIQUE CARS: Dune buggy, f…

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Deluxe Edition
description: Alongside the base game our bundle provides you with the Deluxe Theme Pack. The DLC includes nice gifts: 10 seeds and 100 coins, you can also change the colors of your world. Upgrade your orchard Sell your apples to earn money and improve your orchard. …

name: Dragons Garden: Merge 3 Game
description: Travel to the Dragons Land, use your magic to purify poisoned lands, become friends with wondrous, fantastic Dragons and merge together your very own fantasy land in this No.1 merging and collecting game: Dragons Garden.

name: Super Evolution Illustrated: War World
description: Super Evolution Illustrated adopts a unique multi-choice evolution mechanism, which can customize the evolution direction of Digimon. Each Digimon can break through the upper limit and achieve ultimate combat power. Here, Digimon are not just companions in battle, they also have their own stories. Here, a new adventure in your name is about to begin. Be the next to be called and go now!

name: Rogue Stormers & Giana Sisters Bundle
description: The Giana Sisters and Rogue Stormers Bundle contains discounted copies of Rogue Stormers and Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams.

name: Area Man Lives
description:
Area Man Lives. Or does he? If you could join a radio drama already in progress, talk to the characters and interact with the environments the story painted in your mind, you might find yourself in the world of the area man.

A quirky radio drama unfolds around you in VR while you do your best to keep the radio station humming along as its new DJ. You record commercials, interview callers and try your best to piece together how your actions inside the station impact your listening audience in scenarios so wild they can only live in your imagination.

If it all feels like too much, don’t worry, you’ll have your lonely producer, the resident skeptic, to guide you on your way, not to mention the vaguely British female voice inside your head.

When an unusual area man calls into the station asking for your help, you have to act fast. Will you trust the area man, or do your best to thwart his plans? Is there anything you can do to save the area man from himself?

name: BlazeRush: Star Track
description: BlazeRush: Star Track is a dynamic arcade survival racing game in a new space-themed setting. In this game, everyone can assemble a team of friends in local or online multiplayer. Choose a car to your taste and chase, blow up and cut your opponents off -- welcome to the world of racing and frantic fun!

name: Teen Titans
description: Teen Titans is a video game released for the Game Boy Advance based on the television show Teen Titans.

name: Midnight Guns
description: A tactical/arena shooter with a focus on movement, dynamic level interaction, and throwing rats at each other. Sometimes involves shooting.

name: Music GunGun! 2
description: The 2nd installment of Taito's rhythm-shooting arcade game.

name: Nitro Trucks
description: An arcade game where players race trucks on dirt tracks, collecting nitro-boost and repair powerups along the way.

name: Kuron and the Jelly Islands
description: A physics-based puzzle game where the player taps the screen to have the cat Kuron suck jelly through a straw. The object is to suck up as much as possible without compromising the jelly-structure Kuron is standing on, toppling him into the water below.

name: Egg Runner
description: Help The Egg to collect coins and power ups in this endless runner. Unlock new characters and defeat enemies. Egg Runner is a simple yet addictive game that will bring you hours of fun.

name: The King of fighters XV: Characters Team South Town
description: [Product Contents]Geese Howard, Billy Kane, and Ryuji Yamazaki of "Team South Town" can be used in "The King of fighters XV".

name: 69 Summon Succubus
description: 69 Summon Sucubus - is a game in which you take on the role of a succubus trainer.You have become the owner of a magic book that allows you to summon the succubus Lilith. You need to choose skills for training and complete tasks. After each workout, your succubus will get stronger.

name: Captcha Kills
description: A crossover between Among-us and the Turing Test manifested in a battle royal in which you're to weaponize your own speech with the goal of deceiving others into believing you're dialog is artificially generated and not an imposter of sentient origins. Hide amongst the AI and become the last human.

name: Puppetmaker
description: A 3D first Person Horror Game which takes place in an old dusty house. You are trapped in the house together with an old mysterious Puppetmaker. The key is to be as silent as possible and escape the house by solving puzzles with logic, without being caught by him. Everything you do or move could be heard by the Puppetmaker, so be aware!

name: Ultimate Fighting Championship
description: Sin descripción

name: True Lies
description: It's not like he's saving the world or anything. Oh, yes it is! As special agent Harry Tasker, it's up to you to prevent a nuclear holocaust and stop the Crimson Jihad! Experience all the explosive intensity of TRUE LIES - including never-before-seen secret missions! All the action of the movie mega hit - and none of the romance!

name: Ezekial S. Jackson's Amazing Truckology
description:
Amazing Truckology is a children’s computer game created by Ezekial S. Jackson that teaches children about a variety of trucks. There are four places to explore: the farm, fire station, the quarry, and the building site. Fifteen trucks are included in the game. There are also clickable hotspots in some of the scenes. There are some video clips and animations that shows the player the trucks on how it does and how they work. There are colour photographs on every truck included in the game, as well as some technical information.

Four Truck-A-Rama VR scenes are included in the game, as well as 3D animated models of the fifteen trucks included. The player can also simulate driving one of the fifteen trucks in the game as well. The game features background music which has 40 minutes of songs included. Amazing Truckology is suitable for ages 5 and up.

name: Treasure Seekers: Follow the Ghosts Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Track & Field
description: Sin descripción

name: The Simpson's Road Rage
description:
This is the Game Boy Advance version of The Simpsons: Road Rage that was first released in 2001 for PlayStation 2, Xbox and GameCube. The game is based on the animated television series The Simpsons, and is part of a series of games based on the show.

The game stars Homer, Marge, Bart, and Lisa, as well as Mr. Burns and several other characters from the show. The Simpsons: Road Rage is similar to Sega's 1999 video game Crazy Taxi, in that the main objective is to drive picked up passengers to their destinations as quickly as possible. These similarities led to Sega suing Radical Entertainment and Electronic Arts for patent infringement though it was settled before going to court.

name: Need for Speed ll: Special Edition
description: The special edition of Need for Speed II includes one extra race track, three extra cars, three bonus cars, a new driving style called "Wild", and 3dfx Glide hardware acceleration support.

name: Screensaver Subterfuge
description: In a parallel universe, the 3D maze screensaver included with Windows 95 assumes a bizarre role in the world of international espionage.

name: LazuLight: By Your Side
description:
Like a star pulled from the skies, a bird torn of its wings, you were bound to the Earth that day. You once ruled the skies, feeling the air rush through your hair as you flew between the clouds, clothes fluttering in the wind as you raced higher and higher. However, that's all in the past now, ever since the accident.

Now, completely opposite to what you once felt, the world is monotonous, gray, and dead. You find no meaning in life, as if frozen in time, now that your freedom was taken away from you.

However, that would all come to change with three fated encounters. The appearance of an old acquaintance from the track team, a reserved class president that seems to be hiding something, and a kindred soul seeking solace in the silence.

Faced with these new people who suddenly appeared in your life, you have to make the choice. Do you wallow in your failure in this monochrome prison, or do you take their hand and repaint this world?

By their side, the hands of the clock start ticking once more.

name: Hatching
description: Hatching is a short retro-inspired, point-and-click virtual pet experience based on the Finnish horror film Hatching (2022).

name: TOCA Touring Car Championship
description:
Fight the pack to gain position without losing control of your car as you race on nine different original tracks of the British Touring Car Championships.
This game features eight different game modes, such as single race, championship, time trial, and party play.

name: Antonblast
description: Antonblast is a fast-paced explosive action platformer that's all about destruction. Play as the enraged Dynamite Anton (or his cranked-out coworker Annie) and use your Mighty F’n Hammer to demolish bizarre worlds, tussle with screen-filling bosses, and steal your Spirits back from Satan!

name: Among the Trolls
description: Among the Trolls is a first-person, survival, action-adventure game where the strange mysteries of Finnish forests are unraveled. Embark on a quest to find your vanished grandparents and learn how to survive in the wilderness.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2
description: The sequel to Tony Hawk's Pro Skater adds many new tricks while retaining those from the original, and a complete roster of the greatest skaters worldwide. Among the new tricks is the "manual", which allows the player character to balance on two wheels. There are also more options for scoring high-trick combos. Trick combinations can also be edited and customized. It is possible to visit some of the most popular skate parks in the world, or create your own areas and share them with other players. Players can also create their own skaters, with a choice of clothing and official skateboards.

name: Starry Sky: After Spring
description: Starry Sky: After Spring takes place in Autumn, when the students of Seigatsu Gakuen are busy with preparations for the upcoming culture festival. They’re holding an exhibition, and some advisors from USA came to help the students. Yahisa Tsukiko, along with her childhood friends Nanami Kanata and Tohzuki Suzuya, was surprised to see their friend Tomoe Yoh there. Yoh came to see her in March, but left for America by the end of Spring. It turns out that Yoh is one of the advisors, and he’s staying in Japan until the culture festival is over.

name: The Ferryman
description:
Keep your lantern to your chest, lad. These waters aren't as calm as they may seem...

As the Ferryman, it's your duty to deliver goods and supplies to the denizens of the sea. It isn't an easy job, but it needs doing. The Keepers depend on you, so you'd better get to it. Just remember - the further you stray from the shore, the rougher yet the seas become.

name: Bokehme
description: Bokehme is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the Dream Diary Jam 5. The game starts with Bokehme in her bedroom, who refuses to leave. The game tells you to collect dolls scattered around the dream world.

name: Dream Doll Dimension
description: Dream Doll Dimension is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. You explore a strange dimension, the goal of the game being to solve the puzzles in each room.

name: Iso
description: Iso is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame for Dream Diary Jam 5. It stars a young man named Cygnus. He can only dream or take a shower. His appearance becomes elf-like when dreaming.

name: PokeQuest VR
description:
PokéQuest VR is a Pokémon MMO built from the ground up. Players can socialize, trade, battle and hunt together throughout multiple regions.

PokéQuest was designed to bring back the nostalgia of the original games, and experience it in VR.

The game is multiplayer only and requires an internet connection to play.

name: Blind Monk's Society
description: A class project in Navigation, Game features Audio only gameplay, to simulate being blind and is set in a Monty Python-ish comical world where a group of blind Monks are initiating you into their society by having you perform several audio navigatory task to help you learn to SEE with your EARS. Game Plays through in about half an hour. Created by Kyle Audick & Erik Carlson UCLA D|MA 2008

name: Abashment
description: Abashment is a Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as Jonathan and explore his dreams.

name: Cats in Hell
description: Cats in Hell is an English fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as a cat and explore Hell. The goal of the game is to explore and obtain new skills. Equipping skills doesn't erase the effect of the previous one. This means that all effects can be equipped at the same time.

name: The Legend of Banjo-Kazooie: Gruntilda's Mask
description: A Banjo-Kazooie ROM hack which puts Banjo and Kazooie in Clock Town from The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Bob-omb Battlefield
description: A Banjo-Kazooie ROM hack which puts Banjo-Kazooie to traverse a reimagination of Bob-omb Battlefield from Super Mario 64.

name: Nana
description:
Nana is an English fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You explore nana's dreams, the goal being to explore and collect effects.
Is nana hiding something? Someone?

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Donkey Kong Country
description: A Banjo-Kazooie ROM hack which reimagines the first level (Jungle Japes) from Donkey Kong Country.

name: Outsider
description:
Outsider is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.
You explore the world of the unnamed protagonist. Unlike most fangames, the player can explore outside of the main character's bedroom. A minigame can be played by interacting with the TV.

name: V.D.O
description:
V.D.O is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.
You explore the dreams of Grey and each dream is split into linear sections that the player must complete to progress.

name: Charon's Staircase
description: In this first-person horror mystery game, you set out to bury the horrible past of a tyrannical government. Retrieve and destroy the documents that unravel the secrets that lie beneath Oack Grove. Will you discover the terrifying truth and find your way out?

name: Initial D Arcade Stage 2
description: Initial D Arcade Stage Ver. 2 (known simply as Initial D Ver. 2 in its export release) is a 2002 arcade racing game based on the Initial D series. It is the second game in the Initial D Arcade Stage series.

name: Gotham Knights: Collector's Edition
description:
The Gotham Knights: Collector's Edition includes:
- Deluxe Edition game and content
- New Guard Statue
- Promethium New Guard Transmogs
- Jim Lee Certificate of Authenticity
- Augmented Reality Talon Key
- Gotham City: City of Bridges map

name: Yume Dreamer
description: Yume Dreamer is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. Play as a shy girl called HER who's in a strange world when she enters her dreams. Explore her dreams and experience them for yourself!

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator: Landmark Edition
description: Experience the beauty and detail of mowing the Great British countryside in Lawn Mowing Simulator, the only simulator that allows you to ride an authentic and expansive roster of real-world licensed lawnmowers from prestigious manufacturers; Toro, SCAG, and STIGA as you manage your business.

name: Manda no Yume
description: Manda no Yume is a Yume Nikki inspired game originally made for Dream Diary Jam 2017. Manda enters a different world when she lies in bed. In this world she can discover effects that give her new abilities.

name: Soulstice: Deluxe Edition
description:
Soulstice: Deluxe Edition includes:
Soulstice Full game
Digital Soundtrack
Digital Artbook
Ashen Blade Item Pack

name: Mortal Shell: Enhanced Edition - Game of the Year Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mona
description: Mona is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. Explore Mona's subconscious, her past experience and how it is affecting her mental state.

name: Ultra Mega Xtra Party Challenge
description: Ultra Mega Xtra Party Challenge is a frenzied party game up to 4 players (also solo-player compliant).

name: Px
description:
Px is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2.
You play as an unnamed square who finds themself in a hollow world. The protagonist must explore and uncover the truth behind everything. In most areas, there is a notable NPC that you can talk to who'll quiz you or ask you to complete a task. The game has multiple endings based on the choices you make in the game.

name: Violentolitin
description: Violentolitin is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. You explore the dreams of Puck. The goal is to explore and collect effects. Along with effects, the player must also collect orbs hidden around the dream world to see the ending.

name: Tankitos
description: You can choose if you want to play solo missions or just enjoy some fun with your friends in online. Solo missions has same rules as in original "Battle City" game. Player have to protect his base against enemies. Enemies are spawned with different level and power. If player survive all enemies, player wins and can continue to next level, if player lost his all lives, player loosed and must play again. Most of walls are destroyable and those ones contains pickable items like, healths, armor and variety of weapons.

name: Arma Reforger
description: Powered by the new Enfusion engine, Arma Reforger lets you fight for supremacy over 51 km2 of incredible island terrain in an authentic Cold War setting, or create unique scenarios in real-time with the Game Master curation mode. Return to Everon, the war-driven microstate from the hit game that started it all, Arma: Cold War Assault.

name: Where's Waldo? Exploring Geography
description: Sin descripción

name: Night at the Office
description: A single player mod set in a high-rise office building. Terrorists are taking over the building and working their way up to your location, you then begin a desperate race to save the other employees and stop the terrorists before its too late!

name: Pakoombo
description: Sin descripción

name: Rag Doll Kung Fu: Black Belt Edition
description: Rag Doll Kung Fu: Black Belt Edition includes exclusive skins and a limited edition poster.

name: Horse Life Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Miasma Chronicles
description: From the creators of Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden comes a beautifully crafted tactical adventure you won’t forget. Embark on a quest across a post-apocalyptic wasteland torn apart by a savage force known only as the ‘Miasma’.

name: Brilliance shines in Zhejiang
description: 2D role-playing game Players will play the protagonist, the protagonist's first-person perspective to experience the historical changes in Zhejiang in the past hundred years, and experience and learn from the protagonist's tenacious ideals, beliefs and spiritual strength.

name: The Finally
description: JRPG 2D retro pixel adventure puzzle drama love sacrifice tells the story of a young man who must travel to get back to his lover. The gameplay is a walk to find information from the characters around you. to find a way to continue Walk against enemies with battle commands.

name: Miner Rush
description: A large number of gem mines have been found in the forest. Explore the deepest part of the forest, Dig out the biggest and most beautiful gem king before everyone else

name: Wood Cuter
description: The trees outside the village began to grow wildly, blocking the road and occupying the farmland.， Explore the deepest part of the forest, unlock the secrets of the wild growth of trees, and restore the forest to its former calm

name: Ball Hunter
description: The hunter embarks on a journey into the deep forest of Tiger Mountain. Discover the secrets of the deepest part of the forest, unravel the mysteries of animals turning into spheres, and restore the forest to its original appearance.

name: Potions War
description: There is a war between the east and the west, and as a pharmacist, you provide various potions to the soldiers on the front line. From the initial life potion and magic potion to the power potion and speed potion that increases the speed of the warrior's body.

name: Blacksmith War
description: There was a war between the east and the west, and as a blacksmith, you provided various weapons to the soldiers on the front line. From the initial dagger and short sword, to the sophisticated two-handed sword. For the sake of the warriors, please work hard to build the best weapons.

name: Weird Hat Fight
description: Weird Hat Fight is a party game where you use magical hats to fight your friends to the death.

name: The Bird's Realm 3
description: This is another simple calm open world bird flying simulator! There are no goals or quests, just simply flying around this large island in a sandbox open world to kill time. Find glowing eggs to unlock a bird.

name: Aurelia: Stellar Arising
description: Aurelia: Stellar Arising - 3D Turn-based Fleet vs. Fleet Space Combat Game. Choose between two factions and fight for control of the Aurelia System in over 77 missions per faction. Control fleets of up to 9 ships and give maneuver and tactical commands to each ship.

name: Sore Jaa, Mata ne.
description: A short story. Black and white. Sparse drawings. Sparse music. Three characters. One smile.

name: Snolf: Tournament Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic CD: Episode Metal
description: A mod that adds Metal Sonic and Amy Rose to Sonic CD as playable characters, with their own movesets and changes to the story scenes, bosses and more.

name: Natsu no Hi no Resonance
description: A delicate tale of coming-of-age, with cell phones, and friends in far-off places, and the first blush of unrequited love ...

name: Tiny Troopers Joint Ops: Zombie Edition
description:
Tiny Troopers Joint Ops: Zombie Edition includes the ‘base game’
plus Extra content!
PS4 Exclusive Zombie Campaign! Beware – you will be faced with a multitude of brain thirsty Zombies, including…Chickens!
Over 50 action-packed mini-maps of mayhem!
Recruit specialist mercenaries such as Machine Gunners, Medics and the Elite Delta Force to subdue enemy insurgents!

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción
